Document.name: title
Document.description: guess the title of the page from the first-sentence

Document.name: isRedirect
Document.description: if the page is just a redirect to another page

Document.name: isDisambiguation
Document.description: is this a placeholder page to direct you to one-of-many possible pages

Document.name: sections
Document.description: return a list, or given-index of the Document's sections

Document.name: paragraphs
Document.description: return a list, or given-index of Paragraphs, in all sections

Document.name: sentences
Document.description: return a list, or given-index of all sentences in the document

Document.name: links
Document.description: return a list, or given-index of all links, in all parts of the document

Document.name: lists
Document.description: sections in a page where each line begins with a bullet point

Document.name: tables
Document.description: return a list, or given-index of all structured tables in the document

Document.name: templates
Document.description: any type of structured-data elements, typically wrapped in like {{this}}

Document.name: infoboxes
Document.description: specific type of template, that appear on the top-right of the page

Document.name: references
Document.description: return a list, or given-index of 'citations' in the document

Document.name: coordinates
Document.description: geo-locations that appear on the page

Document.name: text
Document.description: plaintext, human-readable output for the page

Document.name: latex
Document.description: output the page in latex format

Document.name: html
Document.description: output the page in html format

Document.name: json
Document.description: a 'stringifyable' output of the page's main data

Section.name: title
Section.description: the name of the section, between ==these tags==

Section.name: index
Section.description: which number section is this, in the whole document.

Section.name: indentation
Section.description: how many steps deep into the table of contents it is

Section.name: sentences
Section.description: return a list, or given-index, of sentences in this section

Section.name: paragraphs
Section.description: return a list, or given-index, of paragraphs in this section

Section.name: interwiki
Section.description: any links to other language wikis

Section.name: images
Section.description: return a list, or given index, of any images in this section

Section.name: references
Section.description: return a list, or given index, of 'citations' in this section

Section.name: remove
Section.description: remove the current section from the document

Section.name: nextSibling
Section.description: a section following this one, under the current parent: eg. 1920s → 1930s

Section.name: lastSibling
Section.description: a section before this one, under the current parent: eg. 1930s → 1920s

Section.name: children
Section.description: any sections more specific than this one: eg. History → [PreHistory, 1920s, 1930s]

Section.name: parent
Section.description: the section, broader than this one: eg. 1920s → History

Paragraph.name: html
Paragraph.description: generate html output for this paragraph

Paragraph.name: text
Paragraph.description: generate readable plaintext for this paragraph

Paragraph.name: latex
Paragraph.description: generate latex output for this paragraph

Paragraph.name: json
Paragraph.description: generate some generic data for this paragraph in JSON format

Image.name: markdown
Image.description: return a markdown version of this image

Image.name: html
Image.description: return a html version of this image

Image.name: json
Image.description: return some generic metadata for this image

Image.name: latex
Image.description: generate a latex version of this image

infobox.name: keyValye
infobox.description: generate simple key:value strings from this infobox

infobox.name: image
infobox.description: grab the main image from this infobox

infobox.name: html
infobox.description: generate html output for this infobox

infobox.name: text
infobox.description: generate readable plaintext for this infobox

infobox.name: latex
infobox.description: generate latex output for this infobox

infobox.name: json
infobox.description: generate some generic 'stringifyable' data for this infobox

list.name: lines
list.description: get an array of each member of the list

list.name: links
list.description: get all links mentioned in this list

list.name: html
list.description: generate html output for this list

list.name: text
list.description: generate readable plaintext for this list

list.name: latex
list.description: generate latex output for this list

list.name: json
list.description: generate some generic easily-parsable data for this list

reference.name: title
reference.description: generate human-facing text for this reference

reference.name: links
reference.description: get any links mentioned in this reference

reference.name: html
reference.description: generate html output for this reference

reference.name: latex
reference.description: generate latex output for this reference

reference.name: json
reference.description: generate some generic metadata data for this reference

table.name: links
table.description: get any links mentioned in this table

table.name: keyValyue
table.description: generate a simple list of key:value objects for this table

table.name: html
table.description: generate html output for this table

table.name: latex
table.description: generate latex output for this table

table.name: json
table.description: generate some useful metadata data for this table
